article_title: APNewsBreak: Personnel at nuke base probed for drug use

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON (AP) - Defense officials say the Air Force is investigating about a dozen airmen at a nuclear missile base for alleged use of illegal drugs. At least some cases involve alleged cocaine use.
